Founded in 1985, Princeton Information is one of the nation's largest privately-held consulting firms. Since its inception, Princeton has been continuously operated by the same founder and chairman providing the stability upon which our client's have come to depend. Princeton Information provides Fortune 500 and Mid-Cap companies with a full range of on-, near- and off-shore solutions and staffing services. Our steady growth to revenues in excess of $140 million has been internally generated without the benefit of merger or acquisition. We attribute this growth to consistently providing superior support to high-quality clients and competitive opportunities to the best technology and business talent in the country. Princeton operates with 8 regional offices across the United States and with a Solutions Center in India.•	Recruiting for everything from IT and Developers, to Accounting and Finance, and recruiting for cleared jobs requiring everything from a Public Trust to a TS/SCI w/CI Poly.  •	New recruitment tools include JobDiva, ClearanceJobs.com, Linkedin Recruiter, and Dice, in addition to working with previous tools such as Indeed and Linkedin Basic.•	Check out the links to our Clearance Jobs company page, as well as our jobs page below:Company Page - https://www.clearancejobs.com/profiles/971654/princeton-information-jobsClearance Jobs - https://www.clearancejobs.com/careers/971654/princeton-information-careers

●	Making 40-80 calls per day and sending up to 100 emails/Linkedin Messages, to set interviews and recruit accounting and finance individuals on behalf of the Accountemps, Management Resources, and Robert Half Finance divisions, and placing an average of 60 to 80 recruits per quarter in contract, contract-to-hire, and direct hire roles.  ● Consulting with candidates and clients to find them the best fit for their future.● Creating job postings using several platforms, attending networking and recruitment events, and developing my Linkedin network.Our RH Divisions: Robert Half Finance & Accounting is the world's first and largest specialized financial recruitment agency. Since 1948, our financial services recruiters have provided companies with highly skilled accounting and finance professionals, while assisting financial professionals with their career advancement. We provide a cost-effective financial recruitment solution for our clients, who benefit from our unique insight.ANDRobert Half Management Resources is the world's premier provider of senior-level accounting, finance and business systems professionals on a project and interim basis. We provide companies cost-effective project resource solutions and staff augmentation services. AND Accountemps is the world's first and largest specialized temp agency for accounting, finance and bookkeeping professionals. A premier temp agency, Accountemps helps job seekers find positions in accounting and finance at the best organizations worldwide. Our temporary staffing solutions not only provide you with job opportunities, but also offer registered candidates free access to courses that will help you improve your skills and work toward industry certifications while we work to place you at top companies.

• Prepare timely financials and reconcile bank statements for a variety of nonprofit clients. • Prepare billings, payables, payroll, and cash receipts, as well as prepare journal entries for month end close.• Assist clients in preparing for their independent audit and work with the auditors at year end, providing them with any requested documentation.  Assisted in numerous nonprofit client audits including preparing the Audit workpapers and the Trial Balance in ATB, tests of cash receipts and disbursements, and reviews of Accounts Receivable, Accounts Payable, Fixed Assets and Depreciation.• Prepare and file Personal Property Tax Returns, Business Property Tax Returns, as well as prepare and file forms, 940, 941, 990, and 1099s.• Assist nonprofit clients in preparing annual budgets as well as ongoing budgets for grant reporting and management.

• Perform Internal Controls testing of Investment and Capital Markets (ICM) work stream:  plan, execute and document key controls testing in both the Finance and Front Office areas including Debt, Derivatives, Retained Portfolio, Liquidity & Contingency, and 115 Impairments. Evaluate key controls and their related risk rankings to identify opportunities to create testing efficiencies and reduce testing.• Schedule and perform walkthroughs of ICM business processes and evaluate the overall design of key controls based on identified risks.  Identify and assist in remediation of any Control Deficiencies (CDs).• Develop test scripts and perform and document Tests of Design and Tests of Operating Effectiveness.• Assist ICM team manager in maintaining all testing status reports, the findings log, and the test scripts files and keeping the manager updated on control testing progress. Escalating any major issues or road blocks to the timely completion of testing in a timely fashion the manager.• Develop and maintain good relationship with business areas and communicate any control findings to the control owners and the ICM control leads, and make recommendations to remediate any CDs.• Assist with the training of new hires and contractors in order to get them acclimated to our testing procedures.

Daree Walker
Accounts Payable Lead at World Duty Free Group - WDFG
August 13, 2017, Daree reported directly to Jason

Princeton Information was a rare gem that I would not have discovered had I not been contacted by Jason Monkelien. When Jason contacted me about a job that another recruiter had also contacted me about, I was impressed with Jason’s knowledge of the industry, he was honest and very personable. So from that first interaction, and with my gut, I contacted the first agency to advise that I would go with another agency in my job search and I went with Jason at Princeton Information because I believed in Jason.  Yeah, sure, all head-hunters should be personable, upbeat and have a gift for gab but it was different with Jason, he took a personal interest, he listened, he offered feedback and pointers for me to exceed not only with the contract assignment but on personal matters.  I appreciated Jason and he is not only a great representative with Princeton Information but he is a great person.  However, I was not expecting the perks that came with contracting with Princeton Information!  I have contract or worked as a temporary employee all of my life, in fact, every full-time job I have had were through an agency but never have I ever felt like I was secure with any agency as I did with Princeton Information.  The staff are top notched, knowledgeable, friendly and professional.  Upon walking into the Princeton Information’s office, you are greeted with smiles and you don’t feel like you are there to meet a quota. You actually have an orientation with Princeton Information to learn more about the company and the many benefits.  Did I mention benefits? Yes, from day one on your contract you start accruing a generous amount of vacation and sick leave, you are also paid all major holidays (no you don’t have to work 1000 hours to be eligible!), health, dental, vision and 401(K). Personally, for me, this was the very first agency that not only had a dedicated, personable, professional and knowledgeable staff but one that offered instant benefits.  Fortunately, I was hired full time from the contract that Princeton Information placed me on but it was a hard decision for me because unfortunately, I will not be contracting for Princeton Information, so yes, giving up my “freedom” was a bit hard because the staff at Princeton Information and Jason already made me feel like I was part of a team. I will miss my interaction with Jason at Princeton Information but I would recommend anyone to give Jason and Princeton Information a try if you are in the job market.  Take it from me, Princeton Information stands out from the competitors, in a great way!
Daree Walker

Jason and his team have been absolutely wonderful to work with. Jason was great at identifying possible positions for me that aligned with my skills and experience and my career goals. In particular, with Jason, the process moved much more quickly than I had anticipated--from our initial phone conversation to in-person meetings with the Robert Half team to assessments and feedback to interviews with potential employers to my placement in a new position. In addition, Jason was excellent at following through on things and great at keeping me both informed and encouraged.

summary: I am passionate about what I do, and passionate about helping others, and I do the best that I can to provide the best customer service possible.  I am here to provide resume help, answer questions regarding your job search, and do what I can to assist you.   Please don't hesitate to reach out to me at any point through Linkedin, as the joy of helping people is the reason that I got into recruiting.  Thanks so much everyone and best of luck in 2017!
